experience_professionnelle.description: Involved in the full life cycle of the project including analysis design, development, debugging, testing, and deployment. Developed the application from specifications and requirement gathering. Independently handled modules, scope, analysis, design, build, test the code, debug and implement application. Developed products section of the application which provided Multiple Activities, Custom Adapters, Base Adapter, List views, Links, Web View, Text Views and so on. Developed Navigation Drawer for the application, which provides better navigation of apps features. Created new UI Screens and key resource for layout UI work utilizing xml, Shape Drawable, Text View, List View, Web View, Buttons, Activities, and Frame Layout.

Helped Develop Insight, which is a tablet application that retrieves data from a CPE and displays it. This is done to debug the DSL activity in someones home. Pulled info from a cloud server and coded it onto a tablet. Worked on UI and backend construction. Connected to various computer boards where I retrieved Wi-Fi information from a server - Debugged code that was previously worked on by an outsourced company. There were many bugs and crashes in the app, and I cleaned them all, despite the size of the code. Retrieved wiring and noise data from the CPE by connecting the tablet to the same network.

resume_concis: Développeur Android avec plus de 6 ans d'expérience dans l'industrie informatique, dont 4 ans spécifiquement dans le développement d'applications mobiles. Expert en Python, Java, et C, il a dirigé des projets de bout en bout, créant des interfaces utilisateur personnalisées et optimisant les performances des applications. Diplômé en technologie informatique, il a démontré sa capacité à résoudre des problèmes complexes et à améliorer l'expérience utilisateur.

experience_professionnelle.description: Assisted in determining client needs, deliverable design, estimates and feasibility for analytical projects concerning a custom study for a manufacturer who is using the results to support a litigation claim. Served as an internal resource for Jacknife programming and documentation. Designed and developed small scale deliverables related to the custom study. Participated in the Post Project Review QIP team. Responsible for results reporting in the appropriate media and creation of supporting documentation for the client. Monitored products from statistical programs for accuracy, consistency and statistical validity. Designed and applied statistical and mathematical methods for corporate analytics that were implemented into client-facing products.

Maintained automated ETL for reporting. Implemented Data mining and machine learning algorithms to describe and predict user behavior on various retailer websites. I revamped their 'Predictive Marketing' process to be more data driven and profitable. The new process was able to hone in on more useful user segments that had a significant increase in conversion. Skills Used Data Cleansing and Data Analysis using Python, Scala, R and Spark. Cloud computing on AWS. Automation of reporting.

resume_concis: Robert Smith est un Data Scientist expérimenté avec plus de 10 ans dans l'analyse de données et l'apprentissage automatique, titulaire d'un Bachelor of Science de Stanford. Il a démontré sa capacité à transformer des processus marketing grâce à des algorithmes de data mining et à optimiser des projets analytiques pour des clients dans des environnements complexes. Ses compétences avancées en Python, R et MATLAB, combinées à une solide expérience en physique théorique et computationnelle, font de lui un atout précieux pour toute équipe axée sur les données.

experience_professionnelle.description: As a Developer i am responsible in Gathering the requirments, Create UIDesigns screens, Total end-end development and Uploading the app to AppStore.
NY Model School IOS App - Developed to constantly update parents about their child school activities and build a parent-teacher association.
Silver Tune IOS App - Developed to constantly update parents about their child school activities and build a parent-teacher association.
Bring-up International school - Developed to constantly update parents about their child school activities and build a parent-teacher association.

resume_concis: Samantha Ru est une développeuse iOS expérimentée avec 4,7 ans d'expérience, spécialisée dans Swift et Objective-C, et maîtrisant des outils comme XCode et des services web REST et SOAP. Actuellement chez Edu-Tech Solutions LLC, elle est responsable du développement complet d'applications, de la conception d'interface utilisateur à la soumission sur l'App Store. Passionnée par l'innovation, elle cherche à élargir ses compétences au sein d'une organisation réputée.

experience_professionnelle.description: Collaborate to develop unexpected, strategy-based creative campaigns from start to finish. Accountable for a variety of print & digital collateral and social content. Direct photo and video shoots to support campaigns.
Created print and digital assets to support existing campaigns. Designed app identity for one of the agency’s largest clients. Assisted on photo and video shoots in in-house production studio.
Maintained punktalks.org. Worked with developer to design and launch custom Wordpress site. Created graphics for social and print distribution.
Worked directly with clients to create brand identities and website layouts. Created print materials for Weapons of Mass Creation Fest. Made Photoshop mockups from scratch for the Arsenal web store.

resume_concis: Allison Beer est une Art Director et Graphic Designer talentueuse, diplômée en Graphic Design de Miami University, avec une expertise dans la création de campagnes créatives stratégiques et de contenus numériques et imprimés. Elle maîtrise les outils Adobe Creative Cloud et le développement web, et a une expérience significative dans la direction de projets visuels pour des clients de renom. Passionnée par l'innovation, elle allie compétences techniques et créativité pour produire des résultats percutants.
